body: The Board of Estimate yesterday gave final approval to the Upper East Side Historic District, which encompasses 1,044 buildings from 61st Street to 79th Street. Any major changes in the buildings' facades must now be approved by the city. The board, which must give final approval to any city contract over $10,000, also approved allocating $4.7
title: CITY GIVES FINAL APPROVAL TO UPPER EAST SIDE HISTORIC DISTRICT

body: ON wheels, on foot and on camel, New Yorkers and their neighbors will be celebrating the arrival of May this weekend in the only reasonable way -by getting out of doors. Probably the most noticeable among them will be the participants in the annual Five Boro Bike Tour - some 17,000 are expected to turn out, according to the sponsors of the event,
title: CITY AND SUBURB GOING ALL OUT FOR MAY
